short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Activate this extension for seamless flight deal comparison in just a click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop Wasting Time Searching for Flights! Install the Flight er chrome extension and discover the cheapest fares with just one click. ✈️ Enter your travel details on MakeMyTrip, and watch as our extension instantly opens Skyscanner, Goibibo, and Yatra in separate tabs. 

 Easily compare prices and find the best deal across top travel platforms without re-entering your info! ⏱️ Save time, save money, and travel smarter! 

Key features of Flight finder chrome extension 

Effortless Flight Comparison: 
Easily compare airfare deals across different platforms with a single click, which helps to save user's time and effort. 

Instant Price Comparison: 
Do not bother to search a place by yourself and find the best fares on different websites with the help of re-entering travel data. 

Top Travel Platforms Integration: 
Connects with the well-known travel portals such as Skyscanner, Goibibo, and Yatra, which makes it possible to cover flights with a wide range of airlines. 

Time and Money Savings: 
Save your time by not looking for the best deals on different sites and save your money by finding the lowest fares without any problem. 

How to use: 

Let us begin by opening the Chrome Web Store.Look for the Flight Finder Chrome Extension and install it. 

Add an extension to the bookmark bar for quick and easy access. Then Navigate to MakeMyTrip website, and enter your travel destinations and dates, for instance. 

Simply click on the extension icon to reveal three websites on the right-hand side. Then, click on "Compare." Instantly, the results from leading sites such as SkyScanner, Goibibo, and Yatra will appear in separate tabs.  

Compare prices quickly and easily and make sure that you get the best deals for your trip and save both time and money at the same time.
